name: The Mountaineers Books Bugaboo Rock: A Climbing Guide
description: Towers of clean alpine granite with steep, long, straight-in lines everywhere in sight. It's no wonder climbers from all over the world dream of the Bugaboos, deep in the Purcell Wilderness of BC. This guide is a comprehensive entrée to these dramatic peaks and spires. It includes more than 200 routes, 27 new ones this edition, topo maps and photos with digitized overlays. Get info on permit details, camping, hut stays, and quickly locate routes by name or peak.
